title: 'Wonderful product
column5: 'This is a wonderful product from PA. The smell is very good. It stays for 4 to 5 hours maximum. It is not harsh on the skin. I really recommend this product'

title: 'Quality but very less quantity'
body: First of all fragrance is good not irritating, yes it looks fruity type fragrance. Cons: quantity seems to be very less. Spray nozzle is not covered so might be it is used which make it cheaper product. Dent on body not giving new look. I think company need to be work that atleast spray nozzle is covered and customer open it. So that it didn't feel it is used product

title: 'Unique aroma.. feels light and made of natural ingredients!'
body: 'Very skin friendly.. usually I get worried to apply anything to my skin as it can cause rashes/irritation but this is totally safe. Has a nice spicy fragrance which makes you feel fresh through the day. Loved the simplistic design and packaging.. Looks stylish to carry around.'

title: 'Very good scent..'
body: 'The fragrance of the deo is very good and I liked it. How good to skin is yet to be checked..'
